listify[source]

listify(o)

Listify object, wrap that object with a list if need.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

is_listy[source]

is_listy(x)

isinstance(x, (tuple,list,L))

camel2snake(name)

CamelChar to camel_char

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

snakify_class_name[source]

snakify_class_name(obj, cls_name)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_default_device[source]

get_default_device(use_cuda=None)

Return or set default device; use_cuda: None - CUDA if available; True - error if not availabe; False - CPU

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

unsqueeze[source]

unsqueeze(x, dim=-1, n=1)

Same as torch.unsqueeze but can add n dims

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

reduce_loss[source]

reduce_loss(loss, reduction='mean')

Manipulate loss with option reduction type.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class NoneReduce[source]

NoneReduce(loss_func)

A context manager to evaluate loss_func with none reduce.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

even_mults[source]

even_mults(start, stop, n)

Build log-stepped array from start to stop in n steps.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

generate_val_steps[source]

generate_val_steps(val, n)

Generate n value, if n is slice, will generate a log-stepped array depends on val

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

format_time[source]

format_time(t)

Format t (in seconds) to (h):mm:ss

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

first[source]

first(x)

First element of x, or None if missing

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

apply[source]

apply(func, x, *args, **kwargs)

Apply func recursively to x, passing on args

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

to_detach[source]

to_detach(b, cpu=True)

Recursively detach lists of tensors in b; put them on the CPU if cpu=True.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

PrettyString() :: str

Little hack to get strings to show properly in Jupyter.
